page.title: 15INDUSTRY,CLAPHAM GARAGE.
page.content: When we went to Mr.Hartley's garage,we were taken into the office and he told us a bit about the garage.It was built in 1919,Mr.Hartley bought it in 1955. The garage was made of wood at first and it was burnt down in 1967.It covers an area of 2 acres.The new buildings are used for body work and storing parts.He has 21 employees 18 are men and 3 are women.All of the workers live in a radius of 10 miles.4 live in the village.The garage services 8 cars every working day,they stock 4 new cars and ten second hand cars.They get the parts wagon 3 times a week.Hartley's deals with petrol and repairs.There is a showroom which sells Mercedes Benz accessories,such as sweaters,scarves,lighters,caps car models,and radios.
